name: Forgetful Farkle
description:
Controls:

W/A/S/D - Move

Aims toward cursor, left click to fire a bolt

Left click to place tiles and R to rotate them

-- Patched version --:

There is a small bug which prevents some runs from being able to progress (whoops!). You can check out a patched version here which fixes this (not part of submission):

https://doxume.itch.io/forgetful-farkle-2

Description:

Theo Farkle, a forgetful wizard, has found himself trapped in a magical chamber.
